string-array.item: It\'s perfect for a chilly day. Or a hot day. Or any day. Because bacon.
What\'s more comforting than eating a year\'s worth of calories in a single sitting? With a beer on the side, of course.
Don\'t even try to break up bacon and cheese. Just don\'t.
Four food groups that changed the world in a single loaf of bread. A lesson in teamwork. Tell that one to your grandchildren.
